title: Chat Commands
body:
How do you do the
"q is ready"
"w 3s" 
"r in 30s"

in chat??

Thanks

replies.body:
What Lew said is correct!  Mouse over your ability, the hold Alt and click it!  This will get the cooldown to show up in chat.  

Fun fact, this works for your health and mana bars too!

I typed into google "/mana command in league"

This post was one of the first that came up. I has suggestion

Whenever I go to Alt click my mana bar in game to tell my allies I'm oom I sometimes end up pinging a random spot on the map, or targeting a camp, or pinging my health bar, or communicating some other random info that is not my mana

Chat commands like /mana or /oom would be nice as it is faster in my opinion and doesn't require trying to hit that slim mana bar. /exp and /health 

I hope this suggestion finds it's way

Thanks for the time
You just hold alt + click on the abilities to show their cooldowns in chat.
